unnormalised: Reports are flooding in about the recent wedding of Ms. Aisha Khan, daughter of prominent businessman Mr. Rizwan Khan. The lavish ceremony held on 12/12/2024 at the Taj Mahal Palace in Mumbai was attended by several high-profile guests, including renowned Bollywood director, Mr. Karan Johar, and celebrated fashion designer, Ms. Sabyasachi Mukherjee.
normalised: Reports are flooding in about the recent wedding of Miss Aisha Khan, daughter of prominent businessman Mister Rizwan Khan. The lavish ceremony held on twelfth december two thousand and twenty four at the Taj Mahal Palace in Mumbai was attended by several high profile guests, including renowned Bollywood director, Mister Karan Johar, and celebrated fashion designer, Miss Sabyasachi Mukherjee.

unnormalised: Sources close to the family revealed that Ms. Khan, known for her philanthropic work, looked radiant in a traditional bridal saree. The groom, Dr. Rohan Sharma, a leading cardiologist at AIIMS Delhi, reportedly arrived in a vintage Rolls Royce. "It was a beautiful event, a real celebration of love," commented one guest, Smt. Patel.
normalised: Sources close to the family revealed that Miss Khan, known for her philanthropic work, looked radiant in a traditional bridal saree. The groom, Doctor Rohan Sharma, a leading cardiologist at A-I-I-M-S Delhi, reportedly arrived in a vintage Rolls Royce. "It was a beautiful event, a real celebration of love," commented one guest, Shrimati Patel.

unnormalised: The festivities included a traditional sangeet ceremony on 11/12/2024 and a grand reception on 13/12/2024. The wedding was reportedly planned meticulously by celebrity wedding planner, Mrs. Neha Reddy, and featured performances by famous Indian musicians.
normalised: The festivities included a traditional sangeet ceremony on eleventh december two thousand and twenty four and a grand reception on thirteenth december two thousand and twenty four. The wedding was reportedly planned meticulously by celebrity wedding planner, Mistress Neha Reddy, and featured performances by famous Indian musicians.

unnormalised: Local media outlets are estimating the cost of the wedding to be in the range of Rs. 5 crore. Many well-wishers have extended their greetings to the newlywed couple, including the Hon'ble Chief Minister of Maharashtra, Shri. Eknath Shinde, who sent a bouquet of flowers and a congratulatory message.
